meanings.definition: An organism that produces its own food through photosynthesis or chemosynthesis.
meanings.sent1: The autotroph in the garden is a green plant.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study how autotrophs make their own food.
meanings.sent3: The autotroph decided to throw a photosynthesis party.
meanings.sent4: The autotroph is like a little factory producing its own meals.
meanings.sent5: The autotroph's ability to create food is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: A plant or organism that is able to synthesize its own food from inorganic substances.
meanings.sent1: An autotroph can make its own food from simple ingredients.
meanings.sent2: The autotroph uses sunlight to create energy for itself.
meanings.sent3: The autotroph proudly displayed its inorganic food recipe.
meanings.sent4: The autotroph is a master chef of the natural world.
meanings.sent5: Watching the autotroph create food from scratch is fascinating.
